```{r}
library(reticulate)

# create a new environment
virtualenv_create("r-reticulate")

# install SciPy
virtualenv_install("r-reticulate", c("scipy", "pandas"))

# import SciPy (it will be automatically discovered in "r-reticulate")
scipy <- import("scipy")
pd <- import("pandas")
plt <- import("matplotlib.pyplot")
```
